description: Try our easy to follow Basic Pancakes With Strawberries & Maple Syrup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Mother's Day,Father's Day,Strawberry,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Easter,Peanut free
name: Basic Pancakes With Strawberries & Maple Syrup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Sift flour, baking powder and a pinch of salt together in a bowl. Stir in sugar.
Whisk eggs, buttermilk and vanilla in a bowl. Add to dry ingredients with melted butter and stir until smooth.
Heat a large frying pan or flat grill plate (see tip) over medium-low heat. Grease with a little extra butter.

Add 1/3 cup batter to the pan for each pancake, about 12cm in diameter. Cook in batches, being careful not to crowd the pan, for 2-3 minutes or until edges are set and bubbles appear on surface. Flip over and cook for 1 minute. Keep warm.
Stack onto plates and serve topped with fresh strawberries and a drizzle of maple syrup.
